Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Friends'?
Questions.Explanation: Joey is a spin-off of 'Friends' that follows the character Joey Tribbiani in Los Angeles.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Breaking Bad'?
Questions.Explanation: Better Call Saul is a prequel to 'Breaking Bad' and focuses on the character Saul Goodman.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'The Office'?
Questions.Explanation: Parks and Recreation is a spin-off of 'The Office' and shares a similar mockumentary style.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Grey's Anatomy'?
FalseAnswer: How to Get Away with Murder
Questions.Explanation: Private Practice is a spin-off of 'Grey's Anatomy' and follows the character Addison Montgomery.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'?
Questions.Explanation: Angel is a spin-off of 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer' and focuses on the character Angel.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'The Walking Dead'?
Questions.Explanation: Fear the Walking Dead is a prequel to 'The Walking Dead' and explores the early days of the zombie apocalypse.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Law & Order'?
Questions.Explanation: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit is a spin-off of 'Law & Order' and focuses on crimes of a sexual nature.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'The X-Files'?
Questions.Explanation: The Lone Gunmen is a spin-off of 'The X-Files' and follows the conspiracy theorists from the original series.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'Happy Days'?
Questions.Explanation: Laverne & Shirley is a spin-off of 'Happy Days' and follows the lives of two friends in Milwaukee.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Arrow'?
Questions.Explanation: The Flash is set in the same universe as 'Arrow' and features characters from both shows crossing over.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'The Vampire Diaries'?
Questions.Explanation: The Originals is a spin-off of 'The Vampire Diaries' and focuses on the original vampire family.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Doctor Who'?
Questions.Explanation: Torchwood is set in the same universe as 'Doctor Who' and follows a team of alien hunters.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'NCIS'?
Questions.Explanation: NCIS: Los Angeles is a spin-off of 'NCIS' and focuses on a team of undercover agents in Los Angeles.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Friends'?
Questions.Explanation: Mad About You is set in the same universe as 'Friends' and features crossover episodes.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'M*A*S*H'?
Questions.Explanation: Trapper John, M.D. is a spin-off of 'M*A*S*H' and follows the character Trapper John McIntyre.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Supernatural'?
Questions.Explanation: Arrow is set in the same universe as 'Supernatural' and features crossover episodes.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation'?
Questions.Explanation: CSI: Miami is a spin-off of 'CSI: Crime Scene Investigation' and is set in Miami.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Sherlock'?
Questions.Explanation: Doctor Who is set in the same universe as 'Sherlock' and features crossover episodes.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is a spin-off of 'The Brady Bunch'?
Questions.Explanation: The Brady Brides is a spin-off of 'The Brady Bunch' and follows the lives of the Brady sisters.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the same universe as 'Game of Thrones'?
